A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Initially shocked by the films choices but it snagged on me like a mental thorn.  Could not help mulling it over for days.  You think about this one differently than \"The Force Awakens\" where fans contemplated and speculated about the future of the franchise.  You focus on the choices made in the film.  Now I'm hooked and I have to go back.  \n\nTo quote Yoda.  \"\"A Jedi must have the deepest commitment\, the most serious mind. This one a long time have I watched. All his life has he looked away...to the future\, to the horizon. Never his mind on where he was. Hmm? What he was doing.\"
